/doc/ess_2_init.notes1: This is the start of the loader process
/doc/ess_2_init.notes2: This will set up load management entries for ess_configure
/doc/ess_2_init.notes7: the system will try and load these files from dbi
/doc/ess_2_init.notes8: after completing a successful load the ess_final file will be requested
/doc/ess_2_init.notes9: for now, we have to specify the individual cfile and tmpl loaders as well
